alerts.risk: Campaign index lags behind parity brief or codex references.
signals: Recent codex entry with mq-sci scope lacks pointer to this index.
alerts.consequence: Outreach cadence proceeds without documented Θ; endorsements lose audit trail.
mitigation: Pause outreach pushes; refresh campaign index, bridge dashboard, and codex with shared mq-sci id.
Confirm UTAC status matrix handshake row reflects the update.

guardrail.threshold: ≤24h delta vs parity brief + codex entry

alerts.risk: ArchivSuche lineage missing from campaign assets.
signals: Press kit or outreach doc lacks seed/ArchivSucheUTAC citation.
ZENODO_DESCRIPTION_v1.1.md not cross-referenced in latest codex entry.

Escalate to governance review if omission persists beyond one sprint.

guardrail.threshold: ArchivSuche mention present in all mq-sci codex + parity brief updates

signals: Campaign compass lists endorsement timestamp not present in parity brief.
Codex entry lacks mq-sci endorsement checklist despite new asset.
alerts.consequence: Launch confidence erodes; governance cannot certify readiness.

guardrail.threshold: ≤24h between endorsement update and codex/parity acknowledgement

Synchronise timestamps + mq-sci id across index, compass, sigil, and bridge.
Document fix in codex with archive + ritual references.

Update assets + parity brief; attach ArchivSuche link in codex entry.

recovery_hooks.name: Lantern shelf inspection

Align mq-sci codex IDs + timestamps with bridge dashboard updates.
